word: her sakaldan bir tel çekseler köseye sakal olur

glosses: if everyone contributes a little, someone who has nothing can be helped

pronunciation: /heɾ sa.kal.dan biɾ tel t͡ʃek.se.leɾ kø.se.je saˈkal o.luɾ/
etymology: Literally, “if they pull one strand from every beard, it would be a beard for the beardless person”.
